categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Jeff Moon (October 18, 1952 – October 15, 1979), also known as Geoffrey Moon, is credited by John Mollo as portraying one of four 'local ugly men' in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope as documented in the 1979 book The Art of Star Wars. His character was later given the name Damono Deomaley. His other acting credits include the Space: 1999 episode: The Metamorph.
